name: Malav Shukla

my_business: Triune Consultants Private Limited is a specialized Project Management and Cost Consulting firm dedicated to delivering cost-effective efficiency, quality assurance, and project optimization in the construction industry. We partner with architects, developers, and contractors to streamline project execution, manage costs strategically, and uphold the highest construction standards. With a focus on transparency, precision, and value-driven solutions, Triune Consultants ensures that every project is delivered on time, within budget, and with uncompromised quality.
top_product: End-to-End PMC + Cost Consultancy for real estate projects. We handle everything from budget planning and BOQ preparation to site coordination, quality audits, and cost control — ensuring your project is delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest standard. It’s not just supervision — it’s strategic execution with measurable savings.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a real estate developer, architect, or landowner planning a new project and looking for clarity, control, and cost-efficiency from the start. Someone saying: “We need to finalise the budget.” “We want to avoid cost overruns.” “We’re looking for a PMC or Cost Consultant.” Great referrals also include: Industrialists building factories Schools/hospitals expanding campuses NRIs or JV partners planning real estate Government or institutional projects Think of Triune Consultants when construction stress, budget concerns, or quality issues come up. We prevent problems — and deliver projects with confidence.
top_problem_solved: We solve the problem of construction cost overruns, poor coordination, and delayed project delivery. Most builders and landowners struggle with: Budgets that keep increasing Delays due to poor planning and vendor mismanagement Lack of clarity in execution Compromised construction quality No system for cost control or reporting At Triune Consultants, we fix this with: Accurate budgeting from day one Transparent vendor tendering Construction progress monitoring Quality audits and site checks Cost tracking and cash flow control The result? Projects that are delivered on time, within budget, and without compromise on quality. If you hear someone saying, “Paisa toh bahut lag gaya, par samajh nahi aaya kahan gaya” — that’s a perfect referral for us!
